agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Land & Resource Management TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Thursday, April 25, 2019 PLACE: E2.012 CHAIR: Rep. Tom Craddick HB 991 Burns | et al. Relating to the acquisition of real property by an entity with eminent domain authority. SB 421 Kolkhorst | et al. Relating to the acquisition of real property by an entity with eminent domain authority. HB 1157 Bell, Cecil Relating to the acquisition of property by an entity with eminent domain authority. SB 555 Schwertner | et al. Relating to the qualification of land for appraisal for ad valorem tax purposes as agricultural land and the liability for the additional tax imposed on such land if the use of the land changes as a result of a condemnation. HB 1253 Leman Relating to establishing actual progress for the purposes of determining the right to repurchase real property from a condemning entity. HB 1919 Bailes | et al. Relating to the right of property owners to file complaints against certain entities regulated by the Railroad Commission of Texas regarding alleged misconduct by the entities while exercising eminent domain authority. HB 1987 Leman Relating to reporting requirements regarding eminent domain authority. HB 2831 Canales Relating to the service of notice of a special commissioners' hearing in an eminent domain proceeding. HB 3327 Zwiener Relating to the acquisition of real property for a proposed oil and gas pipeline through eminent domain by a common carrier. SB 553 Schwertner | et al. Relating to the acquisition of certain real property in conjunction with the acquisition of real property for a public use through eminent domain procedures. SB 552 Schwertner | et al. Relating to notice of a property owner's rights relating to the examination or survey of property by an entity with eminent domain authority. HB 4708 Sanford Relating to the powers and duties of the Lakehaven Municipal Utility District; providing authority to issue bonds; providing authority to impose a tax. HB 4749 Schaefer Relating to the creation of the Rose City Municipal Utility District; granting a limited power of eminent domain; providing authority to issue bonds; providing authority to impose assessments and fees. Bills added after last posting: HB 4708 HB 4749 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
